src

Class UniversalBoxLabel.PointF

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.UniversalBoxLabel.PointF
  • Enclosing class:
    UniversalBoxLabel

    public static class UniversalBoxLabel.PointF
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Divish on 9/5/2015. PointF will map points from relative location of the label to real pixel locations on the final label; This way the label can be generated to any size without compromising resolution It simply multiplies point position according to to customizable multiplier factor

    • Field Summary
